results.title: Repairing Myelin After Irradiated Pediatric Brain Tumor: A Magnetization Transfer Imaging Analysis.
results.text_hl: BACKGROUND: While exercise training and @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ treatment have demonstrated preliminary cognitive improvements in pediatric @<m>DISEASE_Brain_Neoplasms</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001932 @@@brain tumor@@@ (PBT) survivors, the neuronal mechanisms underlying their cognitive improvements are unclear.

results.title: Factors associated with longer survival among older medicare patients after diagnosis of supratentorial primary brain malignancies: a retrospective cohort study.
results.text_hl: DISCUSSION: Our study suggests that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, beta-blockers, ACEIs, ARBs, and comorbid @DISEASE_Parkinson_Disease @DISEASE_MESH:D010300 @@@PD@@@ are associated with a survival benefit among geriatric Medicare @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with supratentorial @<m>DISEASE_Brain_Neoplasms</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001932 @@@PMBTs@@@.
